name: Parkour (itch) (Jamie Cropley)
description:
Take part in a virtual experience that you have never once experienced before in your life. Engage in the thrill that is parkour, just don't fall else you die then you have to start again. Some moves take skill, just remember that.

Let me know in comments if you want a release on other platforms, this is just a quick fun game I made, so nothing serious, I can release on M1 Macs, Intel Macs and any Linux OS if need be just request it. Initially only released on Windows.
